name: Just finished “The Batman,” and I won’t say it was the worst Batman movie of all time, but it was pretty bad. Yikes.

content.html: Just finished “The Batman,” and I won’t say it was the worst Batman movie of all time, but it was pretty bad. Yikes.
content.value: Just finished “The Batman,” and I won’t say it was the worst Batman movie of all time, but it was pretty bad. Yikes.

summary: @cleverdevil I cannot for the life of me understand why so many people love the movie. I even watched it twice to see what I was missing. Bunch of gruff mumbling in the rain in the dark is about all I got out of it.

content.html: @cleverdevil I cannot for the life of me understand why so many people love the movie. I even watched it twice to see what I was missing. Bunch of gruff mumbling in the rain in the dark is about all I got out of it.

summary: @jonathan I fell asleep while watching it… in the middle of the day, in our living room. So, yeah…

summary: @jack completely agree. The most egregious part, to me, is that for a movie called "The Batman", the lead is shockingly underwhelming. I didn't want The Batman to win, honestly! 😆

content.html: @jack completely agree. The most egregious part, to me, is that for a movie called "The Batman", the lead is shockingly underwhelming. I didn't want The Batman to win, honestly! 😆

summary: @jack I think the argument was it was good as a “film”, but yes, the mains were terrible
